使用gulp4.0坑

  1. gulp-util is deprecated 弃用
  2. gulp-cli需要使用4.0 gulp
  3. task需要done()或文档的返回方式,否则 [16:20:22] The following tasks did not complete: default, webpack [16:20:22] Did you forget to signal async completion?
  4. task方法有变化,[task1,task2] 废弃,gulp.series(task1,task2,[callback],gulp.parallel(task1,task2,[callback]) 排队执行和异步(同时)执行
  5. es6解构前面一定要有分号 ;
